TITLE.P: Viking Link Project - Invitation Insurance Market Roadshow 30th August 2019 London

SHORT_DESCR.P: Viking Link Project - Invitation Insurance Market Roadshow 30th August 2019 London

In preparation for the EU Insurance tender for the Viking Link project anticipated to attach 1st of January 2020, we are pleased to invite you to a Viking Link presentation that will be held on 30th August 2019 from 09:45 am to 13:00 pm (BST).
Information of attendees must by notified by email no later than 26th August 2019 to: Michael.ekdahl@willlistowerswatson.com
Viking Link Project - Invitation Insurance Market Roadshow 30th August 2019 London

In preparation for the EU Insurance tender for the Viking Link project anticipated to attach 1st of January 2020, we are pleased to invite you to a Viking Link presentation that will be held on 30th August 2019 from 09:45 am to 13:00 pm (BST).

This presentation will include speakers from the Viking Link project who will provide an overview of the project, construction partners, timeline, risk management/SHEQ and technology & installation methods.
The full underwriting submission will be available during the EU insurance tender process which is anticipated to commence 4th September 2019.

Please confirm your availability and name of attendee(s). Number of attendees will be limited to maximum 3 participants per Insurer. We reserve our right to reduce the participant number pending number of total participants due to space limitation for the meeting room facility.
Information of attendees must by notified by email no later than 26th August 2019 to:
